description.oldValue:
The EdgeDefaultProfileEnabled policy will allow you to set a default profile to be used when opening the browser rather than the last profile used. This policy will not be applicable if the "--profile-directory" parameter has been specified.
GA date: April CY2022
description.newValue: The EdgeDefaultProfileEnabled policy will allow you to set a default profile to be used when opening the browser rather than the last profile used. This policy will not be applicable if the "--profile-directory" parameter has been specified.
